translationtableentry.text: Capture the rebel stronghold of Numantia.
translationtableentry.result: Conquista la ciudad rebelde de Numancia.

translationtableentry.text: Scipio Aemilianus must survive in order for Numantia to be captured.
translationtableentry.result: Escipión Emiliano debe sobrevivir para que Numancia pueda ser conquistada.

translationtableentry.text: Capture as many gold outposts as you can.\nThanks to your success, the Senate will send you additional reinforcements.
translationtableentry.result: Conquista tantos fortines del oro como puedas.\nCon tus éxitos, el Senado te enviará más refuerzos.

translationtableentry.text: The central stronghold oversees the entire area. Capture it and you shall have a bird's eye view of the entire region.
translationtableentry.result: La torre vigía central domina toda la zona. Conquístala y podrás ver toda la región.

translationtableentry.text: Capture the townhall sorrounded by villages west of Numantia. You will prevent food from reaching the enemy stronghold and you will be able to supply your troops.
translationtableentry.result: Conquista el foro rodeado de aldeas al oeste de Numancia. Impedirás que lleguen víveres a la fortaleza enemiga y podrás abastecer a tus tropas.

translationtableentry.text: Reinforcements have arrived in your gold outpost. It would be wise to join them to your army.
translationtableentry.result: Han llegado nuevos refuerzos a tu fortín del oro. Sería sabio unirlos a tu ejército.

translationtableentry.text: The guard tower near the western section of Numantia provides archers for the walls. Capture it and they will bother you no more.
translationtableentry.result: La Torre de Guardia, proporciona arqueros para las murallas. Conquístala y dejarán de molestarte.
